so_28279928: while read -r line
do
  if ! [[ $line =~ "dirs" ]]
  then
    echo $line
  fi
done < tmp

so_1182756: sed -i.bak '/line of text/d' *

for file in *.txt
do
    sed '/line of text/d' "$file" > "$file".new_file.txt
done

au_1202880: rsync --dry-run -v -r --remove-source-files \
      --exclude-from='/path/to/excludefile.txt' /path/to/source/ /path/to/somewhere/to_delete

/path/to/source

/path/to/somewhere/to_delete

find /path/to/source -type d -empty -ok rmdir {} \;

find /path/to/source -type d -empty -delete
